text: haey chea karpit nasa yeung ban phdal aoy mou sa nouv kompir ( ta v rt) banteabmk mean ke khvengkoumnit knea nowknong vea . haey brasen bae kmean kar kam am n t( tearounakamm) cheamoun pi mcheasa robsa anak te ke pit chea nung katsechakdei rveang puokke( dak tearounakamm knong lokey) chea min khan . haey pitabrakd nasa puokke sthet knong pheap montilosangsay yeang khlang ampi vea( kompir kuor an)
